text: Liu Heng (; born 6 January 1996) is a Chinese footballer who currently plays for Henan Jianye in the Chinese Super League. ==Club career== Liu Heng started his professional football career in 2015 when his was loaned to China League Two side Baotou Nanjiao from Hangzhou Greentown. In February 2017, Liu transferred to his home town club Henan Jianye in the Chinese Super League.
